page.title: 17LAW & ORDER in GLAMIS
page.content:
There is a Police Office in Glamis with a resident Constable. Another constable and a special constable reside in the area, as does a J.P. and the Procurator Fiscal for Angus District. That such a large number of people involved in law enforcement are resident in the area has more to do with the quiet attractiveness of the area than with a need for heavy policing!
Notwithstanding, crime is on the increase. The increase in housebreaking is attributed to the increased mobility of theives from outwith the area. The enforcement of laws concerning soft drugs (mainly cannabis) consume a considerable amount of police time.
